metadata.Title: CVE-2017-16794 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: The png_load function in lib/png.c in SWFTools 0.9.2 does not properlyvalidate a multiplication of width and bits-per-pixel values, which allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-readand application crash) via a crafted file, as demonstrated by an erroneouspng_load call that occurs because of incorrect integer data types inpng2swf.

criterions.comment: swftools package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
